snippet: A report by outside counsel commissioned by Rutgers on how to handle concerns of abusive behavior by Mike Rice, who was fired this week as the men’s basketball coach.
lead_paragraph: A report by outside counsel commissioned by Rutgers on how to handle concerns of abusive behavior by Mike Rice, who was fired this week as the men’s basketball coach.
